category-def.name: Eclipse Paho MQTT Java Client
category-def.label: Eclipse Paho MQTT Java Client
category-def.description: The Paho project provides scalable open-source implementations of open and standard messaging protocols aimed at new, existing, and emerging applications for Machine to Machine (M2M) and Internet of Things (IoT).
